string.name: insufficient_character_sets

resources.string: Password must contain at least %d character sets in the 4 groups: uppercase, lowercase, number, symbol
Screen overlay showing current light sensor status
Double tap the home key to activate the one hand operation mode
You can create a SnapView to protect your photo, files, and apps.

In SnapView, you may take pictures, save files, install apps. These files and apps remain safe in SnapView and won't be seen once you exit SnapView.

Before you can create SnapView, you need to set up a screen lock for SnapView.

Note: Your SnapView screen lock must not be the same as Owner's screen lock.

In SnapView, you may take pictures, save files, install apps. These files and apps remain safe in SnapView and won\'t be seen once you exit SnapView.\n\nBefore you can create SnapView, you\'ll need to set up a screen lock for Owner.
Before creating SnapView, we suggest you assign a google account as a rescue email account.\n\nYour rescue email account will help you reset your SnapView password in case you forget it.
Before creating SnapView, we suggest you assign weibo account or off-line password as rescue account.\n\nYour rescue account will help you reset your SnapView password in case you forget it.

We're about to verify your rescue password.

Once verification is successful, you can start resetting your lock screen password.

Note: The next screen is account verification, and we don't collect your account information.
We\'re about to verify your rescue password.\n\nOnce verification is successful, you can start resetting your lock screen password.
The rescue account is different from the one you used in creating SnapView. Ensure that you use the same account that you used in SnapView.
Congratulations! Your verification is successful.\n\nNext, you can assign a new SnapView password, or delete your current SnapView.

To delete SnapView, you need to enter a screen lock pass and the random PIN.

When confirmed, SnapView will be deleted from your device. You will lose your photos, apps, and data in SnapView.

This action cannot be undone. Would you like to proceed?
Touch to set up rescue method.
Please assign a new rescue method in case of you forget your SnapView\'s password.\n\nYour rescue method will help you reset SnapView password in case you forget it.
Touch to set up rescue account
Erase all your data in SnapView?\nYou can\'t reverse this action!
Choose a security question and type your answer. If you forget your SnapView password, key in the answer you provided to enable password reset.
Where did you first meet your spouse/partner?
What was the year when you were born?
What was the name of your first school?
When you were young, what do you want to be when you grow up?
Choose a security question and answer to enable resetting your SnapView password.
Draw Owner\'s pattern again to confirm
Draw SnapView\'s pattern again to confirm
SnapView\'s screen lock must not be the same as Owner\'s. Try again.
Owner\'s screen lock must not be the same as SnapView\'s. Try again.
Your SnapView is created! Now, try to enter SnapView using your SnapView\'s screen lock.
Next, please set up a screen lock for SnapView.\n\nNote : SnapView\'s screen lock must not be the same as Owner\'s.
SnapView\'s unlock pattern must not be the same as Owner\'s
SnapView\'s PIN must not be the same as Owner\'s
SnapView\'s password must not be the same as Owner\'s
First, please set up a screen lock for Owner.
SnapView\'s PIN and Owner\'s PIN length must be the same

There are ASUS Backup data found in the internal storage.

Please move backup data to an external storage before formatting, or data would be erased.

Do you want to continue with system reset?
